pr_title: [icalendar] Describe download exceptions a bit more detailed.

timeline.message:
[icalendar] Describe download exceptions a bit more detailed.

Fixes #8846

Signed-off-by: Michael Wodniok <michi@noorganization.org>

timeline.author: cpmeister
cpmeister

replies.bodyText: Yes, it's better to log the cause if the Exception itself is not explanatory.  I thought, warn would also fit for this type of exception as it's quite general. But i don't have any problem to move it to debug.
replies.author: daMihe

timeline.message:
[icalendar] Apply suggestions from code review
